caption.p: Contact transmission of JEV in mice. Mice were i.n. infected with 10 6.0 pfu/50 μL of the SCYA201201 or SA14-14-2 virus. The sentinel mice were commingled with the infected animals at 24 h post-infection. The SCYA201201 strain is marked with hollow symbols (infected with ○ and sentinel with ◇), while the SA14-14-2 strain is marked with solid symbols (infected with ● and sentinel with ◆). ( A) The viral RNA load in the mice lungs harvested at 3, 5, and 7 dpi was measured using real-time RT-PCR. The horizontal dotted lines indicate the limit of detection (**** P ˂ 0.0001). ( B) The virus titer in the lung samples was determined by plaque assay and was presented using plaque-forming units (pfu) per gram of lung tissue.
